name: Eternal Empires
description:
At day one of Early Access Eternal Empires will have:
-skirmish mode with random map generation
-high replayability due to many map settings
-great UI for micro-management of units
-all other essential RTS features such as base building, resource management etc.



Eternal Empires is a real-time strategy game, similar in gameplay to old-school RTS games from early 2000s. It has all the essential RTS features such as base building, resource gathering, resource spending, building up and commanding military, diplomacy with other players etc.

Maps are procedurally generated, with various selectable features such as: size, climate, number of players, etc. There can be up to 8 players on a same map.

Currently there are 4 factions, each with some unique units, buildings and bonuses.

As game progresses, players have to research new technologies to stay ahead.

The game has extensive player to player diplomacy i.e. trading resources, peace treaties, declaring war etc.

Player loses when his king dies, the last king to survive wins the game.
